message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which holds immense value for us at $1000000. Given its significance and the benefits it offers, we believe it would be worth your consideration. We understand its value to you is $800000, and we aim to bridge the gap to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction. Our initial offer is set at $950000. We hope this aligns with your expectations and look forward to discussing further details with you. Let's make this opportunity work for both of us.
